data.text:
Bruce Willis Net Worth: How rich is Bruce Willis? & How much money is Bruce Willis worth? Time to find out!

Bruce Willis is an American actor, producer, and singer and his current net worth is $200 million.

Born in Idar-Oberstein, West Germany, to David Willis, an American soldier, and Marlene, as the oldest of their four children, Bruce is one of the most famous actors of our time.

He went to Penns Grove High School, where he was named Buck-Buck, because had issues with a stutter.

But when he was on stage, he found it easy to express himself, and lost his stutter in the process. He was an active member of the drama club as well as the student council president, while in school.

After he finished high school worked several jobs, as well as a security guard at the Salem Nuclear Power Plant, as well as a private investigator.

Then he turned to acting and enrolled in the Drama Program at Montclair Estate University where he played in the class production of Cat on a Hot Tin Roof.

To pursue his dream, he left school in his junior year and moved to New York City, where he worked as a bartender to earn money.

After a while he left New York City for California where he went to audition for several television shows.

He managed to get a part in an episode of the TV series Miami Vice, titled “No Exit”. Competing against 3,000 other actors for the role of David Addison Jr. in Moonlighting, he was cast alongside Cybill Shepherd. It was a role that helped him establish himself as an actor of comedy, with the show running for five seasons, gained him an Emmy Award.

Thanks to the success of the series, beverage maker Seagram contacted Wills and hired him as the pitchman for their Golden Wine Cooler products. The deal was worth approximately $5-7 million over two years.

But thanks for the role of John McClane in the Die Hard series, Bruce gained international fame. Since then, over the course of 1994-2012, he has appeared in a number of great films, including Pulp Fiction, The Fifth Element, Armageddon, The Sixth Sense, Unbreakable, Sin City, Red, and its sequel, The Expendables 2, and Looper.

By appearing in so many successful fins, he has established himself as one of the richest actors in Hollywood.

As for his personal life, he was married with Demi Moore, with whom he has three daughters, but divorced in 2000.

Since 2009, he has been married to model Emma Heming, with whom he has two daughters.

This wraps up our Bruce Willis Net Worth profile!
